Chemical Actions and Uses/Pharmacologic Actions/Therapeutic Uses/Central Nervous System Agents/Central Nervous System Stimulants
Record.Description: A loosely defined group of drugs that tend to increase behavioral alertness, agitation, or excitation. They work by a variety of mechanisms, but usually not by direct excitation of neurons. The many drugs that have such actions as side effects to their main therapeutic use are not included here.
